lead_paragraph: BERENDSEN--Mildred J. Members of The Chapin School community mourn the loss of Mildred Jeanmaire Berendsen, who brilliantly led our school for 34 years as Headmistress from 1959 to 1993. Millie will be remembered as a passionate and dedicated leader, a tireless ambassador for women's education, a devoted friend, and a proud supporter of every young woman--the names of whom she always knew--who passed through these doors. We send our deepest condolences to her family and hope they find comfort in the fact that her memory lives on at The Chapin School. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BERENDSEN, MILDRED J
